data.title: PrintedEasy.com
data.meta_description:
PrintedEasy.com | 960 followers on LinkedIn. PrintedEasy.com is a UK based online printing company offering a diverse range of products from Labels & Stickers, Saddle Stitched Brochures and Perfect Bound Documents to Presentation Folders and Folded Leaflets

We offer custom sizes and Express or Express Plus production on a wide range of products.
data.text:
Meet The Team: Tony Bannister - Digital Print Operator Tell Us About Your Printed Easy Journey: I started seven and a half years ago when it was Falkland Press, initially printing on a Series 3 HP Indigo press. Now, I predominantly run our two Series 4 B2 HP Indigo presses. Fun Fact: I'm a lifelong Arsenal fan, supporting them at home, away, and abroad. These days, you‚Äôll often find me cheering on my local non-league team, Bishop Stortford, on a Saturday afternoon. ‚öΩ What Do I Like About My Job: The changes and advancements in the digital world have kept this old boy on my toes! Plus, I've made some really good friends along the way.

Meet The Team: Julius Mhuka - Digital Print Night Shift Supervisor Tell Us About Your Printed Easy Journey? I joined the company in February 2016. I operate machines including HP Indigo 12000, 100K, 7900, 7K, 6800, and 6700 in the digital department. I began my printing career in 1986 as a print finisher apprentice and transitioned to a digital printer in 2006. I hold a BA in Print Media Management. A Fun Fact: I play darts and am a devoted family man. I don‚Äôt worry about things I cannot solve. I love life! üéØ What Do You Love About Your Job: I thrive on solving machine issues and exchanging work ideas with my colleagues. I'm driven to work smarter and am very quality conscious. #meettheteam #printedeasy #behindthescenes

Meet The Team: Alex Franklin - Finishing Operator Tell us about your Printed Easy working journey? I started in 2021 as a bench hand after finishing maternity leave from my previous job. I was seeking a role that fit around my children, and after speaking with my friend Jon (Printed Easy MD), he offered me a part-time position, and I haven‚Äôt looked back. Since starting, I've worked in various departments and roles, such as collating, binding, and operating the Multigraphs (short-run scoring & folding machine). A Fun Fact: I love chicken Sunday roasts swimming in gravy‚Äîthe more gravy, the better! üçó What Do You Love About Your Job: The people. Everyone is so friendly and welcoming, which makes me look forward to work.

Throwback Thursday Join us on a journey through time as we look back at the evolution of our factories over the years! üè≠ 1. Unit 1, Falkland Road, Barnet - Where it all began. 2. Unit 18 Alston Works, Barnet - Expanding our operations. 3. 148 Great North Road, Hatfield - Growing and innovating. 4. 1 Meredews, Letchworth - Our current home, where we continue to push the boundaries of printing. #ThrowbackThursday #FactoryEvolution #PrintedEasy #PrintingHistory

Meet The Team: Paul Duffy - Director Tell Us About Your Printed Easy Journey? I joined Printed Easy, which was then a small subsidiary of Falkland Press, as their General Manager in 2015. As Printed Easy expanded over the years, we shifted our focus entirely to the online space and eventually closed Falkland Press. I now predominantly manage marketing, design, UX, and all aspects of Printed Easy's presentation. I've been in the printing industry since 1998 but have focused on the online side of the industry since its inception around 2010. Fun Fact: I was a bit of a trance raver back in the late '90s and early 2000s. ü§™ What Do I Like About My Job: Pretty much everything. We‚Äôre a very dynamic business with extremely talented team members, so no day is the same. If I had to pick one thing I really enjoy, it‚Äôs diving into thousands of cells of data and trying to find a pattern‚ÄîI'm a bit of a data nerd. Follow Paul on LinkedIn - https://lnkd.in/ee8rQkTp #meettheteam #printing #printedeasy

Throwback Thursday Take a trip down memory lane with us as we explore the evolution of the Printed Easy brand! From our early days online to the dynamic and innovative Printed Easy you know today, our journey has seen various transformations. 2008 - Printed Easy Launch - Going online and expanding our horizons. 2015 - Printed Easy 2.0: Growth & Innovation - Continuously improving our services and products. 2018 - Printed Easy Rebrand: The new era of Printed Easy 2024 - Consistently delivering the most advanced online print options. Swipe through to see how our brand has transformed over the years, driven by our commitment to quality and innovation. #ThrowbackThursday #BrandEvolution #Printedeasy #PrintingHistory

Meet The Team Mathew Halling - Workflow & I.T. Tell Us About Your Printed Easy Journey? I started working at Printed Easy in the customer service team 4 years ago after spending over 20 years in prepress. I have recently moved to the workflow department, working on the Switch workflow. A Fun Fact: I‚Äôm a lifelong Luton Town fan, a bit gutted to have been relegated from the Premier League, but hopefully we'll be back again soon! What Do You Love About Your Job: I enjoy working with the latest technology and solving the day-to-day issues that arise with problematic PDF files. Follow Mat on LinkedIn: https://buff.ly/3L7KJdy #meettheteam #printedeasy #printing
